title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: Google Developer Groups JSS Noida and JIIT Noida are proud to announce the GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in Noida carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **11-12th of November** in **Noida**.

title: Call for Speakers
brief: GDG DevFest Noida 2017 announced! The biggest conference about Google technologies in Noida will take on **November 11-12** in Noida.

title: #ShareBooks Contest
brief: Click the most creative selfie with books and win prizes!
